bibl.title: Coin Finds.
bibl.note: 13 coins (bronze or debased silver) from the 4th/3rd c. BC to the 4th/5th c. AD.

S.C. HERBERT and A. BERLIN, with contributions by D.T. ARIEL, T.V. BUTTREY, E. FRIEDLAND, M. LAWALL, R.W. REDDING, and H.T.WRIGHT, Excavations at Coptos (Qift) in Upper Egypt, 1987-1992. Kelsey Museum of the University of Michigan - University of Assiut = Journal of Roman Archaeology. Supplementary Series. 53 = Kelsey Museum Fieldwork Series (Portsmouth, Rhode Island, 2003) pp. 201-203, 13 reproductions de monnaies.
